products.name: Gate Valve

products.name: Globe Valve

products.description: Compact, lightweight valves for large diameter applications.

products.name: Knife Edge Gate Valve

products.name: Swing Check Valve

products.description: High-pressure valves for precise flow control.

products.name: Blow Down Valve

products.description: Large capacity strainers for removing debris from pipelines.

products.name: Y-Type Strainer
products.description: Compact strainers for removing particles from fluid flow.

products.name: Two Piece Ball Valve

products.name: Three Piece Ball Valve
products.description: Fully serviceable ball valves for critical applications.
